comment.text: This translation key is used to display a heading that prompts users to switch to a full version of their license. It appears in a portal settings page and is typically displayed as a button or link. Translators should focus on translating the phrase "full {{license}} version" to accommodate different licensing options.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Tam {{license}} versiyasına təkmilləşdirin" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Switch to full {{license}} version". "Təkmilləşdirin" means 'upgrade' or 'improve', which is not the intended action of switching to a full version.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "Tam {{license}} versiyasına keçin" (Switch to the full {{license}} version) or "Tam {{license}} versiyasına üzün" (Transition to the full {{license}} version).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Erwerben Sie die vollständige {{license}}-Version" translates to "Purchase the full {{license}} version." While not entirely wrong, it implies a purchase is required, whereas the English implies activation or upgrading an existing license. A more accurate translation would convey the concept of switching or upgrading.

The translation "{{license}}版への切り替え" is a literal translation of 'Switch to full {{license}} version'. While understandable, it's not as natural-sounding in Japanese. A more idiomatic translation might be '{{license}}版フルバージョンへの切り替え' or '{{license}}版フル機能への切り替え'.  The nuance of 'full version' is not entirely conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{license}}版フルバージョンへの切り替え

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ປ່ຽນເປັນລຸ້ນ {{license}}ເຕັມ' translates to 'Change to version {{license}} full'. A more natural and accurate translation would convey the idea of 'upgrading' or 'activating' the full version. The word 'ເຕັມ' alone doesn't quite convey the intention of switching.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ຽນເປັນລຸ້ນ {{license}}ເຕັມຮູບແບບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Alterar para a versão completa {{license}}" is a bit clunky. A more natural Portuguese phrasing would be "Mudar para a versão completa {{license}}" or "Atualizar para a versão completa {{license}}". "Alterar" implies a change that might not be positive in this context.

The Serbian translation 'Пребаците се на пуну {{license}} верзију' is a literal translation and might sound unnatural. A more natural phrasing would be 'Активирајте пуну {{license}} верзију' or 'Пређите на пуну {{license}} верзију'.
